name: GetSegmentMembers
description:
Retrieve customer details from a specific segment.

Use this tool to get a list of customer identifiers in a specified segment. It returns identifiers for each person in the segment, providing more comprehensive information than just IDs. Useful for understanding customer segmentation.

parameters.name: segment_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a segment. Find this ID on the segment's page in the dashboard, under *Usage*.

value_schema.description: The identifier for a segment. You can find your segment's ID on its page in the dashboard—go to *Segments*, select your segment, and find the ID under *Usage*. Or you can find your segment using the [App API](#tag/Segments).

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token to specify the start of the page of results. Use the `next` value from a previous response to paginate.

value_schema.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

parameters.name: maximum_results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of customer identifiers to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.
